body:
>  
> It seems i have light leakage problem in my model,, can ne1 tel m ..hw 
> can I fix it..?
> Is thr ne odr option except reconstructing model..? I have done my 
> Model in ecotect....
Do you expect anyone to solve this for you if you ask in a general way 
like this? The question is not about radiance but about modelling in 
ecotect. Most probably it is not a problem of the software. We do not 
know / see the problem. A "light leakage" can be anything from a missing 
ceiling to a rounding error...


CU Lars.
